entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
